snippet: Lt. Gen. Zahir Ul Islam will take over as the director general of Pakistan’s powerful intelligence agency, known as the Inter-Services Intelligence Directorate or ISI.
abstract: Pakistani Prime Min Yousaf Raza Gilani appoints Lt Gen Zahir ul-Islam as Inter-Services Intelligence Directorate director general; Islam, who replaces Lt Gen Ahmed Shuja Pasha, is likely to play a significant role in peace talks with the Afghan Taliban.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and SALMAN MASOOD
byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington, and Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud from Islamabad.

lead_paragraph: Lt. Gen. Zahir Ul Islam will take over as the director general of Pakistan’s powerful intelligence agency, known as the Inter-Services Intelligence Directorate or ISI.

headline.seo: Powerful Pakistani Intelligence Agency Gets New Leader
headline.main: Pakistan Picks New Director for Spy Agency
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Picks New Director For Spy Agency
